name: Star Gaze Maze
description:
You're name is Geoff and you like two things in life; mazes and camping in the forest.

In this fast-paced, other-worldy maze game you will need to jump if you want to survive...

DISCLAIMER: Holey Ghost Gaming does not condone violence towards any living or non-living entity, known or unknown. This game is a fictitious work and is not intended to promote violence towards intergalactic species.
